law.catch_line: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Corps Board" means the Advisory Board of the Corps Program.
"Corps Program" means the Chesapeake Conservation Corps Program established under § 8-1914 of this part.

"Environmental project" means a project that results in long-term preservation, protection, and conservation of the environment, in areas including environmental restoration, agricultural and forestry, infrastructure, energy conservation, and educational improvements.
